Text saved: Cape Town can be bad for baboons.
Cars hurt some baboons.
Some baboons die.
Others play with electric cables.
They get a bad electric shock.
Not many baboons are left.
People want to save them.
They also want to stop problems with people.
So, the city leaders have a team.
These are Baboon Monitors.
The monitors make baboons leave the city.
Or they catch them.
Then they let them go in nature.
This plan helps a little.
But it is hard to stop baboons.
They come back to the city.
They find easy food there.
